data.name: AboutUsContent
data.value:
We decided to start LetterAmazer to make letters easy. Our overall vision is to be friendly. When you use our service or call us, you should feel welcome!

We've made it extremely simple to send a single letter, with no extra charges just because you don't want to register a new account. For businesses it is extremely simple to use, with many ways of integrating to our service.

We are two guys from Denmark. Lars Holdgaard is the tech-wizard and works as a UX/conversion specialist at SAXO.com. Martin Carlsson is the optimization-and-analyst genius, and works as an accountant / data analyst at Rezidor Hotel Group.

How do we send the letters you might ask?

We've hired a global team of goblins working 24 hours a day. No, seriously, we use several sub-contractors around the globe, which does all the hard work. (And we work hard to make sure they deliver the quality you guys need).

Enough talk! Mail us if you have any questions, or send a letter now!

data.name: ApiContent
data.value:
We are currently developing an API, so our system can be integrated into any software application or website. That means if you need automated physical letters, we are there to provide it.

We promise it will be an extremely simple REST API, and we expect it to be up in December 2013 or January 2014.

Frankly, we hate FAQ's, where business owners invent their own questions and answer them by a sales speech. However, we will try to answer some of the obvious questions, we've met when we discuss our business with others.

Can I integrate it into my intranet / portal / website?

Yes, that's the idea!

Unfortunately, it will require some IT-guys to make it work. It probably won't take too long, as we've made it as simple as possible for you to integrate.

Can you help with our integration?

Yes, and yes. Why yes, twice?

First of all, we will of course the help IT-guys. If they have questions or problems, we help... For free. Unlike those 150 USD pr. hour bastards ;-)

If you don't have the IT resources inside your company, it gets more complex. We will help make the integration, depending on the system. Please make contact and we will figure something out.

data.name: ApiHint
data.value: API to send physical letters automatically

data.name: BusinessContent
data.value:
No employee loves the tiresome process of sending those physical letters. Let's make everyone's lives easier, and let us send them for you. Heck, it's probably even cheaper (and much cheaper if you count in the hourly wage).

As a business, you can either use our easy "send a letter" form, and then pay every time you need send a letter, or you can create an account. If you create an account, you can add credits, and then get a friendly e-mail when your credits are running out.

If you create an account and add credits, things get even more easy. You can:

- Send letters by going to our website, upload the file and click "send"
- (Coming soon) Instead of visiting our website, you can just send us an e-mail with a PDF attachment. Then we will automatically print the letter and send it

For the IT-guys, we can even make a more automated solution:

- (Coming soon) REST API which can be integrated into any system
- (Coming soon) Upload files to our web-server using FTP

BUT. Currently we are in beta. That means most of our features are being developed while you are reading this message. Get a message when we are ready by signing up here:

data.name: BusinessHint
data.value: Send physical letters online for businesses

data.name: ForBusinessContent
data.value:
Need to send a lot of letters? Need to integrate letters into an application? You've arrived at the right place.

We provide a backend to companies who need to send multiple letters, which you with ease can use in your business. And yes, we send world-wide.

data.name: HomepageContent
data.value:
We don't get it.

15 Years ago we were blessed with the invention of e-mail, and communication has been extremely easy since. However, we all send physical letters from time to time.

Sending physical letters is so tiresome. First you have to buy some windowed envelopes. Then you have to manually adjust the document, so the recipients address fit the window in the envelope. Then you have to print the documents on a printer (oh wait, who does actually own a working printer with ink these days?). Then you have to bend the paper, and manually put the paper down in the envelope. Afterwards, you have to close the envelope (if you are lucky they seal automatically, if you are unlucky you have to use your tongue). At last, you have forgotten to buy stamps, and you need to go down to the postal office and buy them. Then you can send your letters… if you can find a mailbox.

Okay, let's stop the madness! We have decided to fix this problem so none ever has to face it again.

We have made a service which makes it easy to send letters. You go to www.letteramazer.com, insert the recipients address, upload the letter as a file and then we send the letter for you. Easy, done deal.

Heck, this is especially easy if you have a business. You can create an account with some credits, so you don't have to worry about payment each time. Then you can easily:

- Send letters from our website without using any form of payment.
- (Coming soon) Send us an e-mail with the attached PDF file, so you don't have to go to our website.
- (Coming soon) Use our REST API (the IT-guys know what it is - it's awesome - we promise)
- (Coming soon) Upload the files to our server with FTP (sorry, for the IT-guys again)

Good. It's time to stop the madness. Enough time has been spent licking those damn envelopes and stamps. Let's save time and money, and make everyone happier.

Welcome to LetterAmazer.

data.name: HomepageHint
data.value:
LetterAmazer makes it possible to send physical letters around the globe, without ever touching the letters yourself. And it is easy.

Today LetterAmazer are very good for consumers and soon we will treat businesses like angels. We will add amazing features like an API, mail merging, sending multiple letters plus many many more – it will be like letter heaven. Sign up for our exiting newsletter, to get all the inside scoops.

data.name: LoginHint
data.value: Super fast, and absolutely free to get going

data.name: PleaseCheckEmailAndStartToRecoverPassword
data.value:
Fantastic!
Please click on url in your email and start to recover password.

data.name: PricingContent
data.value:
So, when we started LetterAmazer, we found out sending letters isn't free. But! We have done anything in our power to find the cheapest prices, so you can send letters world-wide cheaply.

Our price structure is really simple:
1.75 USD pr. letter (world wide)

If you need to send additional pages:
1 page: 1.75 USD
2 pages: 1.95 USD
3 pages: 2.15 USD
4 pages: 2.35 USD
...

Why no country specific prices?

Unfortunately EVERY other company sending letters, gives you unique prices for each country. We got so tired of that complex price structure.

One price, all countries. No more rubbish.

Send some letters now! :-)

data.name: PricingHint
data.value: Prices to send physical letters around the globe

data.name: PricingHomepageContent
data.value:
We have providers in all regions of the world, which means we get the cheapest prices.

We constantly try to push the prices down, so we have the most competitive prices on the market.

data.name: SendSingleALetterContent
data.value:
Want to send a letter to someone? It is very easy, and your letter should be on its way within 5 minutes.

You can either use our online text-formatter, or simply upload a PDF file. Then we will take care of your letter, and make sure it arrives as soon as possible.
